name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Core orbital design drills Guardians revisit before clearing any maneuver plan.

cards.title: Kepler Laws Mission Checks
cards.description: Re-derive how Kepler's three laws bound period, velocity envelopes, and swept area before every mission design review to keep truth data within AFSCN tolerances. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
bulletpoints: Confirm T^2 ∝ a^3 for each semimajor axis
Track equal-areas timing to predict burn arcs
cards.summaryText: Refresh Kepler fundamentals so maneuver math stays honest before it hits the ATO queue.

cards.title: TLE to State Vector Drill
cards.description: Practice parsing both TLE lines into ECI state vectors, validating BSTAR drag terms and epoch staleness before uplinking new ephemerides. Ref: AFTTP 3-1.Space.
bulletpoints: Propagate to scenario epoch with SGP4
cards.summaryText: Turn raw TLEs into actionable state vectors without waiting on another analyst shift.

cards.title: Hohmann Window Timing
cards.description: Compute optimal phase angles, DV splits, and burn sequencing for standard LEO-GEO transfers while tracking plane-change penalties. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
bulletpoints: Record total DV in mission ledger
cards.summaryText: Guardians rehearse Hohmann math so transfer briefs withstand delta-V scrutiny.

cards.title: Bi-Elliptic Trade Study
cards.description: Compare bi-elliptic and classic Hohmann maneuvers for large apogee changes, capturing DV, timeline creep, and thermal dwell impacts. Ref: SDP 3-0.
cards.summaryText: Know when a bi-elliptic arc actually buys DV margin for the Delta.

cards.title: RAAN Drift Management
cards.description: Model J2-driven RAAN drift rates versus mission revisit needs so you can schedule burns that stay synced with CSpOC-maintained reference planes. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Stay ahead of RAAN drift so your plane doesn't drift out of the supported SPINS.

cards.title: GEO Station-Keeping Budget
cards.description: Break out annual north-south, east-west, and momentum unload allocations per SITREP to defend fuel planning across the sustainment horizon. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Sustain GEO slots by proving every meter-per-second in the burn plan.

cards.title: Molniya Orbit Design
cards.description: Size Molniya inclination, argument of perigee, and dwell times to guarantee northern hemisphere coverage while respecting radiation limits. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
bulletpoints: Set ω to anchor apogee dwell
cards.summaryText: Shape Molniya profiles so polar customers keep persistent look angles.

cards.title: Rendezvous Phasing Math
cards.description: Use Clohessy–Wiltshire equations to time phasing loops, closing rates, and keep-out spheres before any proximity operation brief. Ref: AFTTP 3-1.Space.
cards.summaryText: Master CW math so your RPO plan hits the stack ready for approval.

cards.title: Launch Window Geometry
cards.description: Calculate daily launch windows by aligning Earth rotation, target RAAN, and phasing constraints to avoid wasted countdown cycles. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Tune launch windows so range, weather, and orbital planes all sync up.

cards.title: Differential Drag Steering
cards.description: Plan attitude profiles that modulate drag area for passive phasing or separation, coordinating with thermal and power teams. Ref: SDP 3-0.
cards.summaryText: Use drag like a control surface without violating subsystem red lines.

cards.title: End-of-Life Disposal
cards.description: Validate graveyard boosts or controlled re-entry plans to comply with national debris standards before decommissioning. Ref: Space Policy Directive-3.
cards.summaryText: Close out missions with debris-compliant maneuvers Guardians can defend.

cards.title: Conjunction Avoidance Math
cards.description: Rehearse probability of collision (Pc) calculations, miss distance projections, and burn box construction before each daily CSpOC sync. Ref: SPD-3.
cards.summaryText: Turn CDMs into maneuver decisions without delaying the supported commander.
